extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed version of Ivanti Connect Secure or Ivanti Policy Secure.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Patch
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest security patch to mitigate the vulnerability.

cve_id: Ivanti Connect Secure and Policy Secure Vulnerability
affected_products: Ivanti Policy Secure versions prior 22.4R1.2, 22.5R1.3, 22.6R1.2, 9.1R16.4, 9.1R17.4 and 9.1R18.5
